revised_title: Description of a Large Stone Near Cape Town
tldr: The author describes a massive stone near Cape Town, called the Tower of Babel or Pearl Diamond, which is over half a mile in circumference and nearly half its length in height. The stone is made of solid granite and has a smooth surface with a few fissures. It is believed to have been formed through volcanic or exhalation processes, similar to the formation of other mountains in the area.
